tool_description: Performs batch updates on multiple products simultaneously, supporting price changes, inventory updates, content modifications, and status changes with validation and rollback capabilities.

product_ids.description: List of product IDs to update in batch

update_type.description: Type of update: price, inventory, content, status, or category

update_values.description: New values corresponding to each product ID

validation_level.description: Validation strictness: basic, standard, or strict

rollback_enabled.description: Enable automatic rollback on batch update failures

update_reason.description: Reason for batch update for audit trail

schedule_time.description: ISO 8601 datetime to schedule the update

notification_email.description: Email address for update completion notification

batch_size.description: Number of products to update per batch (1-50)

retry_attempts.description: Number of retry attempts for failed updates (0-5)

error_messages: Product ID mismatch: Number of product_ids must match number of update_values
Invalid update type: Use one of [price, inventory, content, status, category]
Invalid validation level: Use one of [basic, standard, strict]
Batch size out of range: batch_size must be between 1 and 50
Retry attempts invalid: retry_attempts must be between 0 and 5
Invalid schedule time: Provide future datetime in ISO 8601 format
Update validation failed: One or more update values failed validation checks
usage: Provide matching arrays of product_ids and update_values, specify update_type; optionally configure validation_level, rollback_enabled, and other parameters for customized batch processing.

failed_updates.description: Number of products that failed to update

update_summary.description: Summary of the batch update operation results

failed_product_ids.description: Product IDs that failed to update
